page.title: 19RECREATION HARDWICK AREA
page.content: Children & adults play a variety of sports & games,including hockey,tennis badminton,table tennis,rollerskating, gymnastics,snooker,swimming,horse riding(gymkhanas,jumping,trailriding) & watch football,go walking & cycling. Gardening is very popular,a few belong to a horticultural society & exhibit at shows,1 keeps bees & sells honey, several produce for & help at 2 W.I. markets,do flower arranging,bird watching,photography,shooting,take part in quizzes,play cards & indoor games or do crossword or jig saw puzzles.Many people's greatest recreation is reading.This is a very caring & friendly area,there are many 'good neighbour' activities & hundreds of pounds are raised every year for all kinds of charities by coffee mornings,stalls & house to house collections.
